All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Adventure
Class to represent an adventure entity.
AdventureDAO
Interface to manage the data of the adventures.
AdventureManager
This class is to manage all the logic regarding an adventureAdventure.
Adventurer
Class to represent the specific behaviour and traits of a Adventurer entity.
APIAdventureDAO
This class is to store and read adventure instances Adventure information through an API.
APICharacterDAO
This class is to store and read character instances CharacterGame information through an API.
ApiHelper
Helper class with the responsibility of reading and posting Strings to an HTTPS API.
APIMonsterDAO
This class is to store and read monster instances Monster information through an API.
Boss
Class to represent a Boss monster entity.
Champion
Class to represent the specific behaviour and traits of a Champion entity.
CharacterDAO
Interface to manage the data of the characters.
CharacterGame
Abstract class to represent the general behaviour and traits of a character entity.
CharacterManager
This class is to manage all the logic regarding an charactersCharacterGame.
Cleric
Class to represent the specific behaviour and traits of a Cleric entity.
Encounter
Class to represent an Encounter entity.
EncounterManager
This class is to manage all the logic regarding an encounterEncounter.
JSONAdventureDAO
This class is to store and read adventure instances Adventure information from a json file.
JSONCharacterDAO
This class is to store and read character instances CharacterGame information from a json file.
JSONMonsterDAO
This class is to read monster instances Monster information from a json file.
Main
 
Monster
Class to represent a monster entity.
MonsterDAO
Interface to manage the data of the monsters.
Paladin
Class to represent the specific behaviour and traits of a Paladin entity.
UiController
This class is to control the logic of the use interface.
UiManager
This class is for printing data and receiving data from the console.
Warrior
Class to represent the specific behaviour and traits of a Warrior entity.
Wizard
Class to represent the specific behaviour and traits of a Wizard entity.
